dataList.content: <size=75%>View the 1st event Story Stage to Unlock</size>

Rarely, you may obtain <color=#1998fe>[Resentful Scabbard]</color> from clearing Event Stages, Main Story Stages, or Mirror Dungeons.

<color=#1998fe>[Resentful Scabbard]</color> is converted to 20 <color=#008d0d>[Bloodied Scabbard]</color>.

During the event, you can earn <color=#1998fe>[Bloodied Scabbard]</color> by clearing event Stages and Dungeons. You can also obtain <color=#1998fe>[Bloodied Scabbard]</color> by clearing Main Story Stages or Dungeons for the first time, or clearing the Mirror Dungeon.

Rarely, you may obtain <color=#7fc6ff>[Resentful Scabbard]</color> from clearing Event Stages, Main Story Stages, or Mirror Dungeons,
and <color=#7fc6ff>[Resentful Scabbard]</color> is automatically converted to 20 <color=#1998fe>[Bloodied Scabbard]</color> upon acquisition.

In the <color=#1998fe>[Reward Exchange]</color> window, you can purchase various rewards by spending <color=#1998fe>[Bloodied Scabbard]</color> you have collected.

Earn <color=#1998fe>[Bloodied Scabbard]</color> via the following methods:
Event Stage & Dungeon clears, Mirror Dungeon clears,
and Main Story Stage & Dungeon first-time clears.

In the <color=#1998fe>[Reward Exchange]</color> window, you can purchase various rewards
by spending <color=#1998fe>[Bloodied Scabbard]</color> you have collected.

During the event period, deploying the following Identities on your team will
boost the amount of <color=#1998fe>[Bloodied Scabbard]</color> earned.
You can earn a maximum of <color=#1998fe>120%</color> boost to the amount of event currency earned.
